Job Description:
Scogo Networks Pvt. Ltd. is looking for a Frontend Developer in Pune location (Relocation support will be provided) having expertise in React.JS and interested to work in a fast - moving startup culture with cutting edge technology stack. You will be architecting and developing the core application for a very unique use case.

Who are we: Scogo Networks is an internet startup and is on a mission to disrupt $25 Billion service industry in India with its globally unique and unmatched business model. We are on a bandwagon to transform the entire service industry through our unprecedented business logic together with automation.

What we are looking for : Minimum 2 years of experience in React.JS
